name: Asta Nova Enterprise Solutions
body:
###What We Do...
**Asta Nova Enterprise Solutions** is consulting company based in Toronto, Ontario. We offer a wide range of services to reach your targeted audience focusing on retaining your customers. Our service includes Web development, Android development, Big Data and E-commerce solutions, Enterprise Web Services and Data Warehousing. 

### Services
* Asp.net Development
* Java Spring Development
* Android Development
* R and Hadoop Solutions

### Solutions
* Dedicated Programmer
* Open Source Customization
* e-Commerce - Product Catalog Development
* e-Commerce - Search Engine Implementation
* Android Applications Development
